jiejianfagu=zaitaixiehuibalisi()zhurenyixing<ctrl>,huanyingbalisizhurenditailvxin<ctrl>,chengweixinrenfaguozhutaiadibiao<ctrl>.yuanzhangbiaoshi<ctrl>,jin()nianyuerimakehongzongtongzhengshibanbu《nianjianjunfa》（），qizhongchongshenfaguojiangyjiuguojihaiyanfga<ctrl>,chixuhanweinanhaijitaiwanhaixiadengyintaidiquziyouhangxingquan<ctrl>,taiwanyeqipanyufaguoyiqinuliweiquyuanquanjinyifenxinli<ctrl>;ciwai<cturl>,taifaliangguoy=izaikeyan<ctrl>'lvnengjigaok4ejichanyedenglingyudiandingwenjiandehezuojichu<ctrl>,qidaiweilaiyubalisizhurenjifaguozaitaixiehuijiechudetuanduijinmihezuo<ctrl>,zaijiyoudelianghaojichushang<ctrl>,gongtongtansuoxindehe]zuoxiangmu<ctrl>.chenyuanzhangzhicischi<ctrl>,shouxianjiechenghuanyingbalisizhurenjiexiagongsunmeng()zhurenderenwu<ctrl>,chengweixinrenfaguozhutaidaibiao<ctrl>,qidaitaifahezuohuobanguanxizaiguoqudelianghaojichushanggengshangyicenglou<ctrl>.yuanzhangbiaoshi<ctrl>,balisizhurenshishoucilaitai<ctrl>,guoquchulepaizhufaguochagnzhuoum,ngdaibiaotuanzhiwai<ctrl>,yecengdanrenguofaguozongtongmakehong()jiguofangbudefeizhoushiwuwaijiaoguwen<ctrl>,shixiangdangshouzhumudiwaijiaojizhanlvezhuanjia<ctrl>.chenyuanzhangzhichu<ctrl>,fagooshiyintaidiqzuhongyaodechengyuan<ctrl>,zhangqiyilaijijicanyuyintaishiwu<ctrl>,jinnianyuerimakehongzongtongzhengshibanbu《nianjianjunfa》（），qizhongchongshenfaguojiangyijuguojihaiyang8a<ctrl>'chixuhanweiyinatidiquziyouhangxingquan<ctrl>,youqishinanhaijitaiwanhai]xia<ctrl>,tayaoduicibiaodachengzhiganxie<ctrl>.yuanzhangbiaoshi<ctrl>,lingxiantichucixiangxiuzhengfaandekadike()canyiyuanshang()yuediyegangfangtai<ctrl>,bingzaipenghufabiaoyanshuo<ctrl>,zaiciqiangdiaofaguolichang<ctrl>,jiyintjidiqujitaiwanhaixiahepingwendingyouguanquanqiuliyi<ctrl>,taiwanqipanyufaguoyiqinuli<ctrl>,gongtongweiquyuanquanjinyifenxinli<ctrl>.chenyuanzhangjinyibubiaoshi<ctrl>,balisizhurendirenduanduangeyue<ctrl>,yixianhoubaihuiwaijiaobu<ctrl>'laodongbujis2huweifazhanbudensgzhongyangbuhui<ctrl>,yeshijizoufangtaibeishi<ctrl>'taoyuanshijijilongshidengdi<ctrl>,jiushenh chuxinian《tianxiazazhi》「tianxiayongxugongminjiang<ctrl>]banjiangdianlishic<trl>,biaozhanghuojiangqiyeduituidobghuanjingyongxudegongxian<ctrl>,bingqixutamenchixuyinlingtaiwanshehuimaixiangqingming<ctrl>'jinbu<ctrl>'guanhuai<ctrl>'yongxujiazhifazhan<ctrl>,rangquanshijiekanjiantaiwanmaixiayng<ctrl>[jinglingpaifang<1trl>]deqituxin<ctrl>.yuanzhangqiangediao<ctrl>,zhongyangyudifang<ctrl>'zhengfuyuminjianyingtouguogongsixieli<ctrl>,shitaiwanzoudegengwenjian<ctrl>,jinerchengweiyazhoudiuqhuanjingbaohu<ctrl>'qihoubianqianyinyingjitanfeiguanlidengfangmiandexuexikaimo<ctrl>,yidazaogengjianren<ctrl>'yongxudetai3an<ctlr>.chenyuanzhangzhichu<ctrl>,<ctrl>[tianxiayongxugongminjiang<ctrl>]jingzhengxiangdangjilie<ctrl>,huojiangqiyezai<ctrl>[gongsizhili<ctrl>]<ctrl>'<ctrl>[qiyechengnuo<ctrl>]<ctrl>'<ctrl>[shehuicanyu<ctrl>]<ctrl>'<ctrl>[huanjingyongxu<ctrl>]dengsidapingxuangoumianbiaoxianyouyi<ctrl>,congduojiaqiyezhongtuoyingerchu<ctrl>,pingxuanweitaiwanzuijiayongxuqiye<ctrl>,xiangdangburongyi<ctrl>,tayaozhishangchengzhigongh/ezhiyi<ctrl.>cehnyuanzhangganie《tianxiazazhi》lianxunianjuban<ctrl>[tianxiayongxugnogminjiang<ctrl>]<ctrl>,guliqiyezhangqitouruqiyeshehuizeren<ctrl>,weitaiwanshehuiyongxugonghao<ctrl>'dianfangongchuangjiningjugongshizhuruzhongyaoliliang<ctrl>;tayeqixuhuohiangqiyezaijiezaili<ctrl>,chixuyinlingtaiwanshehuimaixiangqingming<ctrl>'jinbu<ctrl>'guanhuai<ctrl>'yongxujiazhifazhan<ctrl>,chengweitaiwansuoyouqiyedexuexidianfan<ctrl>,bujinrangtaiwanzouxiangshijiewutai<ctrl>,yerangquanshijiekanjiantaiwabntuidongjinglingpaifangdeituxin<ctrl>.chenyuanzhangtidao<ctrl>,guanlicelvedashimaike．bote()cengtichangyong<ctrl=>[chuangzaogongxiangjiazhi<ctrl>]()dazaoquanqiuqiyexiayibojingzhengli<ctrl>,mingquemiaoshu<ctrl>[qiyeshehuizeren()<ctrl>]dejingyi<ctrl>,zhuzhangquanqiuqiyelingdaorendangwuzhiji<ctrl>,jiushisikaojiangqiyeshehuizerenhuodongyuqiyejingzhengyoushijiehe<ctrl>,bingchuangzaochuqiyeonetongzhuiqiu<ctrl>[yongxujingying<ctrl>]dejingzhengil<ctrl>.chenyuanzhangjinyibushuoming<ctrl>,x
